WGSN Barometer

Identify the strengths & weaknesses of your brand as seen through the eyes of your consumers. Find out what’s behind your company’s brand and commercial performance – and that of your competitors’ – with daily surveys to 120,000 consumers each year in the UK & the US, covering 250+ womenswear retailers.

Media Performance

Up to the day view of the level of excitement and attention around each retailer. Measures include unaided awareness, positive & negative buzz and advertising awareness.

Brand Health

Consistent tracking of 250+ womenswear retailers all key measures of brand performance. Measures include awareness, familiarity, affinity, love, consideration and preference.

Demand & Usage

The visitation and usage of each retailer by channel on an annual and monthly basis. Measures include monthly visitation, monthly penetration, annual penetration, conversion and spend.

Lost Demand

The level of customer demand that has been lost by each retailer, through a failure to convert visitation to purchases. Measures include lost demand by channel on a monthly basis and an annual view of lapsed customers.

Customer Experience

The level of customer satisfaction and advocacy for each retailer, amongst customers who have visited or bought in the past 30 days. Measures include satisfaction by channel and advocacy.

CPM

A strategic maps of how consumers perceive your product offer against pricing perception. Developed by Oliver Wyman, it identifies the important factors driving satisfaction.

Key Figures

10,000

Interviews conducted each month, across UK & USA
